value.title: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Migrate an ASP.NET web application to Azure with Visual Studio

topItems.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

topItems.title: Implement logging in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to implement logging in an ASP.NET web application so you can store log data in Azure Blob storage and incorporate log information into Azure Application Insights performance data.

topItems.title: Improve session scalability in a .NET Framework ASP.NET web application by using Azure Cache for Redis
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Cache for Redis to store session data and improve the scalability of web applications.

value.title: Protect public sector data in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn to design conceptual architecture for data classifications using data residency for Microsoft 365 and Dynamics 365 services while utilizing Azure regions and Customer lockbox. Manage breach notifications in Service Trust Portal and Azure Security Center. And encrypt data throughout its lifecycle.

topItems.title: Design cloud solutions for the public sector
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to the stakes and options for implementing Azure to safeguard public sector data.

topItems.title: Encrypt public sector data in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Overview of the options available for managing encryption keys and encrypting data throughout its lifecycle, with special attention to public sector.

value.title: Apply cluster upgrades and security patches with Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Apply the latest version upgrades and patches to your Azure Kubernetes Service clusters.

value.title: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics
value.excerpt: Threat detection with Azure Sentinel analytics

value.title: Analyze query results using KQL
value.excerpt: Analyze query results using KQL

value.title: Externalize the configuration of an ASP.NET app by using an Azure key vault
value.excerpt: Learn how to use ConfigurationBuilder to dynamically configure an ASP.NET web app to retrieve secrets from an Azure key vault.

value.title: Audit the security of Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines
value.excerpt: You'll learn about Azure Security Center and how to onboard Windows Server computers to Security Center. You'll also learn about Azure Sentinel, security information and event management (SIEM), and security orchestration, automation and response (SOAR).

value.title: Explore security concepts in Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Explore and experiment with securing a machine learning environment to ensure data remains private and models are accurate.

value.title: Deploy Azure Sentinel and connect data sources
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy Azure Sentinel and connect the services you want to monitor. Then you can use Azure and AI to provide analysis of security alerts.

value.title: Build multi-table statements using KQL
value.excerpt: Build multi-table statements using KQL

value.title: Cloud security
value.excerpt: Cloud Admin course from Dr. Majd Sakr at Carnegie Mellon University. Keeping your cloud secure means more than just adding permissions to resources. Learn about what cloud security means, including threats, cryptography, and regulation.

value.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
value.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Configure network security groups
value.excerpt: You will learn how to implement network security groups and ensure network security group rules are correctly applied.

value.title: Configure storage security
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure common storage security features like storage access signatures.

value.title: Connect Azure assets to Azure Defender
value.excerpt: Connect Azure assets to Azure Defender

value.title: Connect Common Event Format logs to Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Connect Common Event Format logs to Azure Sentinel

value.title: Connect data to Azure Sentinel using data connectors
value.excerpt: Connect data to Azure Sentinel using data connectors

value.title: Connect Microsoft 365 Defender to Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Connect Microsoft 365 Defender to Azure Sentinel

value.title: Connect Microsoft services to Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Connect Microsoft services to Azure Sentinel

value.title: Connect non-Azure resources to Azure Defender
value.excerpt: Connect non-Azure resources to Azure Defender

value.title: Connect syslog data sources to Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Connect syslog data sources to Azure Sentinel

value.title: Connect Windows hosts to Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Connect Windows hosts to Azure Sentinel

value.title: Create and manage Azure Sentinel workspaces
value.excerpt: Create and manage Azure Sentinel workspaces

value.title: Design for security in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate security into your architecture design, and discover the tools that Azure provides to help you create a secure environment through all the layers of your architecture.

value.title: Design and implement network security
value.excerpt: You will learn to design and implement network security solutions such as Azure DDoS, Azure Firewall, Network Security Groups, and Web Application Firewall.

value.title: Encrypt public sector data in Azure
value.excerpt: Overview of the options available for managing encryption keys and encrypting data throughout its lifecycle, with special attention to public sector.

value.title: Explore the Zero Trust approach to security in Microsoft 365
value.excerpt: Explore the Zero Trust approach to security in Microsoft 365

value.title: Explore DevOps Continuous Security and Continuous Operations
value.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Security and Continuous Operations.
